issue.title: [Logging] Habitat lamp is not inserted on log playback

content.raw:
I don't think it's about the filter, because all the static bling inside the habitat is being properly inserted without being filtered. 

It looks like a more general issue with light insertions during log playback. It should be working since [this](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/2200/process-insertions-on-world-setstate/diff) PR but it looks like it's broken even when inserting a light into an empty world. I'm looking into it.
content.html:
I don't think it's about the filter, because all the static bling inside the habitat is being properly inserted without being filtered.

It looks like a more general issue with light insertions during log playback. It should be working since this PR but it looks like it's broken even when inserting a light into an empty world. I'm looking into it.
